common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Retrieve detailed information for a specific validation bill
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. If data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"yMmpTaE"},{"description":"

Number of records returned per page, the maximum limit is 500, and page_no * page_size must be <= 10000.

","name":"page_size","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"PEQDZeJ"},{"description":"

Unique identifier of the billing entry.

","name":"validation_id","sample":"602516439202502","type":"string","required":"True","key":"yPzsmcC"},{"description":"

Billing month in the format YYYYMM (e.g., 202405).

","name":"validation_month","sample":"202502","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"tfbsPiJ"},{"description":"

Source of campaign setup. Applicable values:

ShopeeManaged

Seller

","name":"campaign_source","sample":"ShopeeManaged","type":"string","required":"True","key":"CSGhkzC"},{"description":"

Unique identifier of the order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"CWTUQ80EF9","type":"string","required":"False","key":"KKhDJjs"},{"description":"

Hierarchical product category classification. (L1 Category)

","name":"l1_category_id","sample":"104136","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"RDswWTm"},{"description":"

Hierarchical product category classification. (L2 Category)

","name":"l2_category_id","sample":"241360","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"kPXFfJw"},{"description":"

Hierarchical product category classification. (L3 Category)

","name":"l3_category_id","sample":"404136","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"xDWTWh"},{"description":"

Unique identifier of the product.

","name":"item_id","sample":"3702824955","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"hkRaTBj"},{"description":"

The product's name.

","name":"item_name","sample":"item1","type":"string","required":"False","key":"mnaCSf"},{"description":"

Verified Status. Applicable values:

Valid

Invalid

","name":"verified_status","sample":"Valid","type":"string","required":"False","key":"mMzaiwk"},{"description":"

ID referencing the campaign rule applied. (Ties to the campaign seller created).

","name":"attr_campaign_id","sample":"18071","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"JyKbXPb"},{"description":"

Start time (inclusive) of order placement, in timestamp format.

","name":"place_order_time_start","sample":"1753459200","type":"timestamp","required":"True","key":"NfsTPZK"},{"description":"

End time (inclusive) of order placement, in timestamp format.

","name":"place_order_time_end","sample":"1756051199","type":"timestamp","required":"True","key":"EKinJNt"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"error_param","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"yApGHyh"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid page_size","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KEzGaWc"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kyfTHTp"},{"description":"

Response payload containing result data.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"XPyBzxF","children":[{"description":"

Array of order records. Each object contains order and commission details.

","name":"list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"YXPRWxw","children":[{"description":"

Unique identifier of the order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"YSWVY8D7OU","type":"string","required":null,"key":"PkrWeaC"},{"description":"

Current status of the order (e.g., Pending, Completed, Cancelled).

","name":"order_status","sample":"Pending","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wRENPxY"},{"description":"

Verification status of the order (Unverified, Verified).

","name":"verified_status","sample":"Unverified","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GWzntr"},{"description":"

Time when the order was placed.

","name":"place_order_time","sample":"2025/8/10 15:36:22","type":"string","required":null,"key":"TZPisQY"},{"description":"

Time when the order was marked as completed.

","name":"order_completed_time","sample":"2025/8/10 13:10:00","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nDXbZrW"},{"description":"

Time when the conversion (affiliate action) was completed.

","name":"conversion_completed_time","sample":"2025/8/9 17:38:54","type":"string","required":null,"key":"hMPiYFt"},{"description":"

Display name of the affiliate who promoted the item.

","name":"affiliate_name","sample":"Yoyi popup","type":"string","required":null,"key":"BkSHEjP"},{"description":"

Login username of the affiliate.

","name":"affiliate_username","sample":"yiyi.test.0206.19","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jrbwzKK"},{"description":"

MCN (Multi-Channel Network) linked with the affiliate, if any.

","name":"linked_mcn","sample":"auto.id.108","type":"string","required":null,"key":"iytxHin"},{"description":"

Partner identifier for the campaign.

","name":"campaign_partner","sample":"testid.mcn.0","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QbyyEiS"},{"description":"

Type of order: Direct Order or Indirect Order.

","name":"order_type","sample":"Direct Order","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bXsHWSF"},{"description":"

Commission (amount) for the whole order, paid by the seller.

","name":"order_brand_commission","sample":"2999.7","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GcDBGKF"},{"description":"

Traffic channel or platform where the promotion took place.

","name":"channel","sample":"Shopeevideo","type":"string","required":null,"key":"SYXdadi"},{"description":"

Unique identifier of the affiliate.

","name":"affiliate_id","sample":"11393990003","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xSbaRWx"},{"description":"

Buyer Status. Applicable values:

New

Existing

","name":"buyer_status","sample":"Existing","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KJsdDHt"},{"description":"","name":"items","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"rnwGrF","children":[{"description":"

Unique identifier of the item in the order.

","name":"item_id","sample":"3903624400","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"tGJMsHX"},{"description":"

Name of the item in the order.

","name":"item_name","sample":"item1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HFPerZe"},{"description":"

SKU/model identifier for the item.

","name":"model_id","sample":"1232348722","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"XPypDTm"},{"description":"

Level-1 global category id classification of the item.

","name":"l1_category_id","sample":"104136","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"irKkXHa"},{"description":"

Level-2 global category id classification of the item.

","name":"l2_category_id","sample":"204136","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"stbRafr"},{"description":"

Level-3 global category id classification of the item.

","name":"l3_category_id","sample":"404136","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"BEBGppQ"},{"description":"

Identifier of the promotion campaign linked to the order.

","name":"promotion_id","sample":"36262963_0_0","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zxxCxQr"},{"description":"

Item price in cents (or smallest currency unit).

","name":"price","sample":"90","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"QbtYPWj"},{"description":"

Quantity of the item purchased.

","name":"qty","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"GBtiRtj"},{"description":"

Type of seller campaign:
1. Seller Open Campaign – Open to all affiliates.
2. Seller Target Campaign – Restricted to designated affiliates.

","name":"seller_campaign_type","sample":"Seller Open Campaign","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EtRwHTS"},{"description":"

ID referencing the campaign rule applied.

","name":"attr_campaign_id","sample":"1130273167000412","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"BaGEDas"},{"description":"

Total purchase value of the order in cents (or smallest currency unit).

","name":"purchase_value","sample":"9099","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ceKetwT"},{"description":"

Amount refunded for the item.

","name":"refund_amount","sample":"50","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fMYdhZi"},{"description":"

Commission (amount) for the item, paid by the seller.

","name":"item_brand_commission","sample":"899.91","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mdpBNNQ"},{"description":"

Commission rate allocated to the affiliate for the item.

","name":"item_brand_commission_rate_to_affiliate","sample":"10%","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jCHcFjn"},{"description":"

Commission (amount) allocated to the affiliate for the item.

","name":"item_brand_commission_to_affiliate","sample":"899.98","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bFrEawS"},{"description":"

Commission rate allocated to the MCN for the item.

","name":"item_brand_commission_rate_to_mcn","sample":"33%","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dMjmzNy"},{"description":"

Commission (amount) allocated to the MCN for the item.

","name":"item_brand_commission_to_mcn","sample":"233.8","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mjsbWSd"}]}]},{"description":"

Total number of entities that match the condition.

","name":"total_count","sample":"345","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ydEMsZx"},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of datas.

","name":"has_more","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"RWPJpKd"}]}]}
